{{Infobox Software | name = Acronis Rescue Media | logo = | screenshot = [[Image:Acronis Rescue Media.png|300px|Acronis Rescue Media]] | caption = Acronis Rescue Media Live CD | collapsible = | author = | developer = [[Acronis]] | released = | latest release version = | latest release date = | latest preview version = | latest preview date = | frequently updated = | programming language = | operating system = | platform = x86 | size = | language = English | status = current | genre = [[disk imaging]], [[disk partitioning]] | license = | website = [http://www.acronis.com/company/inpress/2006/07-25-3.html Acronis Rescue Media at www.acronis.com] }} [[Image:Acronis True Image - Live CD.png|thumb|300px|[[Acronis True Image]] Home running from the Live CD]] '''Acronis Rescue Media''' is a [[Live CD]] produced by [[Acronis]].
It is not sold directly by Acronis, but can be created by [[Acronis True Image]] or Acronis Disk Director Suite.
It can include both [[Acronis True Image]] and Acronis Disk Director Suite if both programs are installed on the computer. It can also include Acronis Drive Cleanser if Acronis True Image is installed. ==Features== Depending of the software included, it can: *Make disk image files (in [[.tib]] format) (Acronis True Image) *Restore disk image files (Acronis True Image) *Resize partitions (Acronis Disk Director Suite) *Erase all the data on a computer (Acronis Drive Cleanser) ==External links== *[http://www.acronis.com/company/inpress/2006/07-25-3.html Official WebSite] [[Category:Operating system distributions bootable from read-only media]] [[Category:Cross-platform software]] {{storage-software-stub}}
